vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥεβέκκα, -ας (see Bl., § 7, 2), ἡ, (Heb. רִבְקָה),
Rebecca: Rom.9:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.22.23;
daughter of: Bethuel (H1328A);
sister of: Laban (H3837A); married to Isaac (H3327);
mother of: Esau (H6215) and Israel (H3478)
§ Rebekah, [possibly] "choice calf"
Rebecca, (Proper name), Rom. 9:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利百加 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "誘捕者"
以撒的妻子 (羅 9:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利百加 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "诱捕者"
以撒的妻子 (罗 9:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Rê-be-ca: theo tiếng A-rạp « rabkat » là «dây sẹo để xỏ mũi thú vật», «có lẽ chỉ về sắc đẹp người nữ ràng buộc» hoặc đánh bẫy người nam. Xem H7259.
